.. _lee:

Lee and Choi
============

.. code-block:: bibtex

    @article{lee2004computation,
        title={Computation of grain boundary energies},
        author={Lee, Byeong-Joo and Choi, Shi-Hoon},
        journal={Modelling and Simulation in Materials Science and Engineering},
        volume={12},
        number={4},
        pages={621},
        year={2004},
        publisher={IOP Publishing}
    }
